storyInfo: At the summit, the Sui Regulator's game with Nian and Dusk seems as if a grand board game, the words 'affairs come in no more than threes' fallen onto it. Below, the people's grievances flow thick and fast, a picture scroll encompassing the scene in whole. Ling finally shows herself, simply to eulogize on the sunset.

attributes.content: ...Young man.
attributes.name: Passing Elder

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: Can I ask the way to the estate of Liang, Magistrate of Shangshu?
attributes.name: Passing Elder

attributes.content: Uhh... it's close by, I think. Turn right there and keep going, and once you see the paifang arch, turn left and you're at the Liang estate.
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: Is it spacious?
attributes.name: Passing Elder

attributes.content: Who knows, I'm not allowed in.
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: But from the outside... I think it doesn't look that different from any other place. Might even be a little run-down.
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: What does it say on the arch?
attributes.name: Passing Elder

attributes.content: I don't remember.
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Passing Elder

attributes.content: Hey, old man.
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: It's getting dark, how about I show you the way? You might get hit out here.
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: ...No need.
attributes.name: Passing Elder

attributes.content: I can see the way.
attributes.name: Passing Elder

attributes.content: —Ugh!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: (My foot... it's stuck in a rock?!)
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: That's enough.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: You've lasted thirty-three moves. Commendable.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: You never were pulling your true weight at all.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: If you're interested in joining the army, your prospects will surely be bright.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Hahah... I'll admit I contemplated it when I left Kou-wu City, but the proverb puts it well: don't bite off more than you can chew. I'll repay Rhodes Island's grace to me for now.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: To know grace and repay it. Qualities hard to come by.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: A shame you're trapped in your situation.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: In a literal sense, to boot.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: (If I break my leg, maybe I can tug it out still... let's try it and see...)
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Zheng Qingyue, I'll assist you!
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Stop right there!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: *Pant*... *pant*...
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I regarded this tangle as a farce, and invested nothing in it.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: But you've shown me I was wrong.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: You've got less to say now.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: You always had so little to say in the past.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Zheng Qingyue is only silent when going all-out. But when he goes all-out, no opponent escapes intact.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Are you done talking?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I'm only speaking to myself.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Huff...
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: It's raining...?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: (He broke Shang Zhong's staff so easily?! Before we could even react—how did he do it?)
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: —Who are you?!
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: A bamboo hat and raincoat, the rain as your sword.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Excellent kung fu.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Stop fighting. Stop, all of you.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Would it hurt to be a little peaceful?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Not to mention how capable they were. If they were willing to cause a commotion, they'd have won, and come out looking reasonable too.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: You're the boatman who was with the Lungmenite since the beginning...
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Of course. Liang Xun had two plans prepared.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: He's deceived both the Sui Regulator and the Ministry of Rites.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: *Sigh*... As an official, Mr. Liang has his restrictions. Don't you think the Sui Regulator's been too arbitrary this time?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: It wouldn't be the Sui Regulator's first time, either.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: My son died because of you. Don't forget it.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: And why all the fighting for our lives here?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Hmph. Sticking your nose into this too. How capable do you think you are?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Hahah... making that hat such a permanent fixture always did strike me as awfully odd.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Unless, of course...
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Shen Lou, this is Sui Regulator business. It's not yours to interfere in.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I'm just a passing boatman, encouraging you all to stop slaughtering each other here, from the goodness of my heart—
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: —and checking on the state of the summit. Mr. Liang asked me to take a look.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: There were bandits terrorizing the border waterways in recent years. The court sent men to sort it out, cracking down like thunder. With a tianshi leading them, some of the best in the court infiltrated enemy lines.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: In order to avoid alarming the enemy, the heroes pretended to be waterway bandits themselves, stealing into their den, rounding them all up at once.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: —But when they came back out, they ran headfirst into a group of boaters who sought to stand up for justice. There was quite some misunderstanding.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: They were hardly lifelong boaters, though, and the boat was just a skiff, approaching the waterside bandit den on its own.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: No more, no more, I'll die of embarrassment... I'm not young anymore, and I didn't want to wade in for a fight like some brawler!
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: The people only knew that tianshis took the lead. They had no idea that others beyond could truly be calling the shots.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: The Imperial Guard drillmaster appraised you quite highly.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Oh, that girl was so young, but her kung fu was incredible. I heard she'd already been helping train the other warriors. She would go far, very far...
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: But I'm not here today to reminisce.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: An escort like me has only deep respect for you, Master Shen. No matter if it's our first meeting, I'd hear you out.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: It's just that we're settling both public and personal bills today, and your word might not make it in... that's the size of it.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: But I did agree with Mr. Liang that I'd express some things of my own.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: No matter what the Department of Discipline and Supervision decides afterwards, I'll shoulder the burden. But for now, don't let any dogma here harm our friendships.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: That won't fly.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: If Liang Xun sent you, then this can't be as simple as a 'check.'
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: You plan to meddle in the Sui Regulator's affairs?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: The Sui Regulator just wants to push Tianshi Bai into action. Does it make any difference if I act for him?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Master Shen, I'm on your side.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Friendship is wealth, they say.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Where's your benefactor?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Ahead for now.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: That's fine—
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Wh... What? Where did that summit and pavilion... come from?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: That's what... we've all been looking for...
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Here's hoping we can keep this under control...
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: ...Or else we can only resort to violence.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Are you aware of what you're saying?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I need your agency's help, young Candleholder. We should be in agreement about the stakes here.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Are you going to kill yourself?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'm not that out of it yet, but... things are getting tight.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Is Its mind not your minds?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Of course not.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: It's about time we rose up against that giant self of ours.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: All nonsense.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: What ideas do you have?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Are you willing to trust me?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I'm only obligated to hear out your idea. Whether I trust it, or not, is the Sui Regulator's decision.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You hold fine tastes, my Lord, to be admiring the snow in the mountains at this hour.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Here, sit.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You knew I would come.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Of course you would come.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: When did the Sui Regulator first seek you?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: A year ago.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: On what matter?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Finding the goblet.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Merely finding it?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: At first.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: A year ago, Yan realized something.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Victoria's incidents. Ursus's endless unrest. One of Leithanien's Empresses losing her voice.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: All under heaven was in turmoil, and Yan had to prepare.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The court met day after day, and passed the 'Twenty-Eight Policies.' Nothing unaccounted for, and not solely seeking the safety of Yan, but offering survival to the known world.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: But outside of the Twenty-Eight Policies published, there were still hidden two more that needed Yan's urgent decision.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: ...Hoh.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: What two?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: There are wicked foreign spirits to the north, seas to the south, and ever more hidden dangers from Sui's bestializations.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: All along, the Sui Regulator has advocated for initiative in settling this Feranmut problem.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: The Ministry of Rites doesn't agree. Not at all.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: The High Minister is indeed correct. There lies not only usable talent among those twelve... there are, above all else, several brilliant and virtuous.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: But the Sui Regulator's very founding was aimed at sorting out the issue of this Feranmut.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Their opinion cannot be taken on all matters. The Sui Regulator was, at its founding, but subordinate to the Ministry of Rites.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: It was only the disaster following that game of stones that elevated the Sui Regulator in position.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: *Sigh*... It is a hidden malice of a thousand years, brewing calamity 'til today. To reckon with it is due.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: But it's not the Sui Regulator's right to decide, nor for the Ministry of Rites to say.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: ...The current Grand Tutor?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: The Grand Tutor has met with that great offender.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Looks like I really did nap too long... So that's what the old guy's like?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: His physique was paper-thin, and he didn't seem like he knew Arts. I thought he was just some random nosy guy, poking into everybody's business.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: The Grand Tutor mends the realm's affairs, inspecting for leaks and patching holes.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Huh, I thought you'd get angry at me badmouthing the oldie.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Angry?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Would you show anger at a rascally child who blames the sky for raining?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: (This boy... he's got a steely tongue...)
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: (That's the first time I've seen Nian get checked like that.)
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: The Grand Tutor gave the Sui Regulator a hidden aim. Something that must be accomplished, whether or not we openly chafe with the Ministry of Rites for it.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Oh. And what's that?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Three things.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: It is turning colder.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: The mountains are always quicker to cool.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: This mountain truly did not choose its scenery well. How does it keep hold of its customers?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: How do you figure?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You cannot see the sunset.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: That's fair.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Is it very arduous, that you do so much for the Sui Regulator, my Lord?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: It's even more arduous hiding it from you, Miss Ning.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Three years ago, for the Ministry of Rites, I was sent to Shangshu to supervise Ling, who was suspected of settling here.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: And you, magistrate of Shangshu, had more sway in reality than some of your ordinary colleagues, it is true.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I first thought you were inflexible, easily riled.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I must have amused you, Miss Ning.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: My Lord, for what purpose have you done so much, over all these years?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: My own outlook has never changed.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I do it seeking the wellbeing of the people of my home.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Hesitating not to deceive the Ministry of Rites and the Sui Regulator?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: What could be more important than the people's safety?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You know the Ministry of Rites is prepared.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Spring thunder was always the emblem of the passing of winter. I wish not for its clap to reduce the Three Mounts' Seventeen Peaks by yet another.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You are as you ever were, my Lord.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: But you still are not willing to face me, in the end.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: How could I?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: And how could you not? Your behavior is all too clear.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Our ranks are different. Our posts burden us.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: But if...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: If you come as no more than Miss Ning, then I, Liang, would be more than glad to.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: So such... openness... is also within your capacity.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Liang Xun lifts his teacup.
No tea is within, but still he takes a long drink from it.
...Three things?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: First, retrieve the goblet. We don't know why, but he spilled all to the Grand Tutor as to the cup's origins and rough whereabouts.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: And you weren't worried it was a trap?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Second, aside from preserving the two hidden policies, find an even more reliable proposal, to keep this situation suppressed to a minimum.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Oh... Yan always comes off real cautious whenever you touch on the folk of the realm.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Third...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Go on.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: No matter who they are, should more than three proxies gather on one side, pass on personal handwritten instructions from the Grand Tutor.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Handwritten instructions?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: So, I ask, Where is Dusk?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Ugh... how did I...
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Wh-Who are you...
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: I forgot about you.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Whatever. Someone knocked you out.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Wh-Where's dad? And Shang Zhong?! And that giant bull—
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Don't bother looking.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: You won't find them.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: This is...
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: So she could alter heaven and earth in the blink of an eye...
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: That woman who suddenly appeared... Just what could her game be?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Gkh...
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: You're joking! Not again?!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Th... They're in a painting?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: You wouldn't understand, even if I told you.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: W-Wait, where are you going?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: The summit.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: But isn't the Field of Forgotten Water right th—
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: —When did... that pavilion appear?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: It came from time immemorial.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Ao—!
attributes.name: Waregeist

attributes.content: Eek!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: These things... Is she imitating me with these things, to mock me?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: ...You really don't know how to cut slack.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: This is my duty.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I have a question. Just a question, okay?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: If I don't go along with you, what'll the Sui Regulator do?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: They'll simply do again what was done a millennium ago.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Moreover, now, we are strong, and your powers feeble.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: ...Hoh.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: The Sui Regulator's principles are simple. Finish it once and for all, and forever rid the future of plague.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: And that's why I'm telling you, we've got the same stakes in this as you.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You're only scheming to allow yourself escape.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Even if I believed you, why should I believe you can accomplish this preposterousness?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: If you can't, then how much unnecessary danger will your existence engender? Doesn't the Sui Regulator have an even more 'dependable' plan to solve this problem?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You cannot convince me.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Looks like we're at a deadlock.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: What do you think?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Are you asking me? You could just go ask the one you were looking for.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: You must be...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: So this is his supposed big idea?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You're the one who doesn't know anything at all, boy.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: If you don't want three hundred years of standing in the corner, then don't give me that look.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: D-Dusk, it's alright, calm down...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: You know how this goblet came about.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Hand it over.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You tasked Liang Xun with it, Liang Xun tasked me. If you want the cup, I think you should go ask Liang Xun for it.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You understand reason, Mr. Lee. You should know the severity of this.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'm sure Liang Xun has his reasons.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: If Ning Ciqiu doesn't give a reasonable explanation, Liang Xun will pay for his unilateral action.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Hm.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Okay, we can dial down the aggression once in a while, little buddy. If the Sui Regulator's so thirsty to have this...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Why does the Sui Regulator want this goblet so bad again?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: It's that weiqi weirdo's scheme, probably. He's bored enough to—
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: —No... he's not like this.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Is he actually still locked in the capital...? What happened?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: The last time the Sui Regulator neared that shrine, a body was discovered inside it.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: It was Grandmaster Xiang Ru. Heart failure, died while vomiting blood. The weiqi board was empty, save for a single black stone at the center.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Didn't you say you had a whole taboo about meeting him?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: The Sui Regulator is investigating it.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: But this goblet, without a doubt, is a crucial key to uncovering his plot. And the two of you, Miss Nian, Miss Dusk...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The Sui Regulator wishes for you to come with us.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Ahahah, now that's getting a little complicated...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Is he really a step ahead of us?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Why limit yourself to one step?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: No wonder the old man was so overbearing.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: In that case... how about Miss Ling?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The Sui Regulator records that he disagrees with all the other bestials, willing only to recite poetry and make merry with Ling and Shu.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: If she still won't show herself, then the Sui Regulator's only option is to—
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Do you seek me?
Her gaze is at the setting sun.
Crossing the immemorial, and other times besides.
For in truth, time is a place.
A place only the free and unshackled can halt their step in.
Phew... aaahh... come, look now at this view.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: The sun is through, and water runs yet long... while snowfall flows through moonlit vacant sky.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: The setting light sets clouds ablaze. How charming, yea, how fine.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: With such beautiful scenery, why still must you persist with such unjoyful topics?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: When did...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Mm, you and your father in his younger years do seem so alike. And yet...
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: You could turn a blind eye to this, to a sky of endless twilight clouds?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Have you never been alive upon this land?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Okay, keep applauding the sunset in a moment.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I spent a looooot of effort hauling Dusk out to find you, and I didn't do it just to hear you wax poetic.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Long time no see, Nian, Dusk.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: And you.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Huh? You and old Lee know each other?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Prior to this...
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Do such lowly means not insult your character some?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: I couldn't get it past you.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: But I never imagined you'd see through me in an instant.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Whose path did you think you walked?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: I wasn't banking on truly fooling you.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: And besides, he's the one who daydreamed. The one who met him in a dream was only me.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Isn't this a game I learned from you?
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Myself I stay when I awake; the butterfly it stays in dreams.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: But will it be him still, when he comes to?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Who knows.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: It is beyond you.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: How dearly rude, Ling.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: If you have the true capability, go bicker so with our eldest brother. Why the cruel trickery on a common human?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Those of different ways cannot plan for one another.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Hm? So you and I are of the same way? Why did I not know?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: For how vivid your toast-drinking and revelry was, you're quite merciless.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Which is right. After all, you've thrown away... that goblet I sent you.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Could I ever? It was simply a moment's distraction, while singing to the moons.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: I should be the one disappointed. At that time, you had far in advance... laid one stone.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Hmph... hahah...
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: And what do you laugh at?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Nian's own overestimation. Dusk's timid impotence. Your uninvolvement. And myself, for considering myself so infallible.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: ...You truly wish to substitute?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Hm? What is it? What are you looking at me for?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: No, it is only me seeing through a dull game.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: What did you seek me for?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: What, we can't just pay you a nice little visit, Ling?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You fell asleep?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: I'm asking. Did you fall asleep?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: How are you able to—
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: When drunk, I simply sleep.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: What of it?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: How did you do it?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: You ask how I did it... ah, I understand.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: You cannot fall asleep, can you? My poor little sister.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Is it because you fear to have nightmares?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: If it can even be called a nightmare.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Mm... In many years, we have not met.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: So such things are vexing you. And your paintings? Could your paintings not bear the weight of your dreams?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: No... is it that you finally began to feel, that paintings—are but false?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Ah! Hey, don't mess with my paintings!
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: You bundled all those guys below us into your little world, I'm guessing.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: And what for... Crude mounts, parched waters. A heart like unto ashes.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: How dull.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Gkh...?
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: But these adorable minor scrawls, these I still find so amusing.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: What need you feed them?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: You should know what we're here to do.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: ...Nian.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: By your idea, where will our course ultimately be taken?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Don't stare at me like that. I'm thinking about it here, alright...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: But right now, I still don't know.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You don't know, then... mm... you do not know.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Not the finest of plans.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Dusk. That scroll all filled with matter in death. It is stagnant, stuck. Somewhat boring. Be rid of it, perhaps.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: You don't get to tell me just like that.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Forget not her at the outset, who gave you all true names in one lone word, and what hopes she had for you.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Ancient history by now.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: What did you just...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Nothing. Only a moment of bliss snatched, away and apart from this world.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: The Grand Tutor had something for you to hand to me, no?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: This and that are independent. Even once you see his instructions, you must still behave and come with the Sui Regulator.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: All to find him. Find that... basket of blunders.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Indeed.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Take it.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Oh? A letter?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Your so-called Grand Tutor's instructions... no.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: This handwriting... would it be him...?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: The Grand Tutor is an ever stern one. He would never draft instructions in such flowing script... Did he tell you no more?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: My duty is solely to give the letter.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: A letter of the court... the first in a long time.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: ...Heheh.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Is it to us? When did humanity ever get the guts for that? I thought only the True Lung and his little posse would work that sort of courage up.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Then you look at its contents.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.text: Affairs come in no more than threes.

attributes.content: ...One affair no more than thrice, I see.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Okay, I get it. Yeah, we sure do fit that bill right now.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: A fulfilled omen...? That decrepit Grand Tutor couldn't have written this!
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: This handwriting looks like Jie's, but she already... could someone else have copied her, somehow? But why do it as the Grand Tutor's 'instructions?'
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: It was that basket of blunders. It seems in recent years, he's 'written' no shortage of things.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: I thought he was obstinate, that it would only be right he incur Yan's flames... and now this written orders, is another move of his? And why should the Grand Tutor send the letter in his stead...?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Hey!
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Unless... the Grand Tutor chose to play white?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Hey! Stop mumbling to yourself!
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: The three lapse into silence.
Though they have existed for so long, the sisters are momentarily stupefied.
The wind blows from primordial to present, this time no longer this moment.
...Tha—That's...
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I—Impossible... Is even this something he can do...
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Don't ask me...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: But, well... even if it's just a reflection... I don't like how it's looking at us.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Dusk, you scared?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Don't you always have plenty of ideas? Think of something.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Hey, Ling.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: We've gotta band together—what are you doing?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Something suddenly came to me. Last I fell dead drunk, I should have left two vessels of wine here... there, there they are.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Husong? Mm... the flavor is still fine to the nose.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: If you're so cool, do you have any solutions?!
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Solutions? What solutions?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Solutions to deal with It—
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: —A solution to address Ourself? Need I tell you?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: You're not just going to sit on the sidelines this time, are you?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I hardly could.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: We meet again.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: On this turn, do I dream of you, or do you dream of me?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: By her tail, Ling lifts the jar half full of fine wine, and pours it forth into the cup, meant for the one who seems the culprit of it all.
She lifts it to the heavens.
Shall we drink?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: I will refrain.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: May you all come one by one, and take your seats,
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Ah...! What happened?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Where are we?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: This feeling—it's just like being in one of Dusk's paintings...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: In that case... who are you?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The night parts as a curtain.
A silhouette sits straight within the center of the room.
Behind him is hung half a scroll.
'The Way to Paradise.'
If you have nothing to do...
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: What say you chat over a game with me?
attributes.name: Lee?
